title: Goldman Sachs Awards One-Time Bonuses to Executives David Solomon, John Waldron
sub_head: Bank grants restricted stock awards and cites ‘the rapidly increasing war for talent’
body:
Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is giving CEO David Solomon and president John Waldron one-time stock bonuses designed to keep the executives at the helm of Wall Street’s biggest bank.
The bank’s board of directors granted Mr. Solomon more than 73,000 restricted stock units, according to a regulatory filing Friday. Mr. Waldron received nearly 49,000 restricted stock units. The executives are required to hit certain performance targets and stay with the bank for the next five years to receive the bonuses.
